headline: Here’s how investors can play latest wave of corporate breakups
summary: Corporate breakups have been a key theme of 2025 so far. Vinson & Elkins' strategic mergers & acquisitions (M&A) head Sebastian Tiller sits down with Josh Lipton to discuss the trend. Read up on Yahoo Finance's coverage of the rising occurrence of corporate breakups.  To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.

headline: Can PepsiCo's Diverse Portfolio Outperform in a Soft Market?
summary: PEP's diversified portfolio and innovation-driven strategy position it to navigate a soft market and deliver sustained growth.

headline: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (KDP) Strengthens Coffee Business with JDE Peet’s Acquisition
summary: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc. (NASDAQ:KDP) is one of the best defensive stocks to buy, according to Steve Cohen. On August 25, the company announced it had reached an agreement to acquire Dutch coffee and tea company JDE Peet’s. The $18 billion deal is expected to be part of the company’s push to bolster its struggling […]

headline: JDE Peet’s transfers shares to participants under its employee incentive plans

(JDE Peet’s or the Company) pursuant to the provisions of section 5, paragraph 4 of the Dutch Decree on Public Takeover Bids (Besluit openbare biedingen Wft) in connection with the recommended public offer by Keurig Dr Pepper, Inc.
